casebody.data:
Hudel GAMBLE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

Jade N. Baldwin, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Hudel Gamble's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 285, 179 A.3d 227 (2018), is denied.
